text: I love cooking that comes from I guess
cooking for myself for a very long time
it truly takes my mind off a lot of
things the way I cook has changed I've
been lucky enough to have a few items
been given to me one item that came to
me was a talking thermometer which truly
helped me out quite a bit in in a sense
of at least letting me know if something
is done in studying putting my hands
into the oven and trying to find out if
it's done enough which is the way I used
to do it when I had sight the one other
item that has given me was a microwave
oven which has numbers on it that I can
feel that are raised that I can feel
what numbers they are before I used to I
you through just hope and press lots of
numbers so those things that come along
have really helped me a lot and I'm
really thankful for it every day that I
go round i have a guy don't that's
